page_title: Tharwah High Institute for Training | Professional Courses
meta_description: Tharwah High Institute offers expert training courses to help individuals and businesses succeed in their careers and industries

headings.text: Tharwah offers a premier global development experience with a local flavor, backed by collaborations with top training organizations worldwide and official recertification status.

Through our collaboration with SHRM, we specialize in offering bespoke HR development programs, aimed at empowering professionals of all levels.
Unleash your leadership potential with our customized leadership development journeys. Experience tailored programs for leaders at all levels.
Experience our Professional Skills Development service tailored to enhance soft skills. We specialize in delivering self-development, team skills, and future-oriented programs.
Elevate your workforce with our comprehensive suite of Training Consulting Services, with tailored solutions to bridge knowledge and skill gaps, ensuring your workforce thrives.

Prepare for professional success with our Fresh Graduates Development Service. We provide tailored programs combining mentorship, skills training, and career guidance to equip graduates for the workforce.
Unlock your potential with personalized coaching by our certified experts. Receive tailored guidance for personal and professional growth.
No matter your goals — we’ll help you find the path that suits you best.

At the National eLearning Center, we worked with Tharwah on an essential project which was the Organizational Transformation Strategy. During our engagement with Tharwah, we had an excellent experience as the project team and leadership from Tharwah pushed beyond the limits to meet our requirements and needs.Tharwah uses best-fit global practices and methodologies in carrying out their consultancy work. What we liked the most is their flexibility, attention to details, and passion to deliver high quality which exceeded the expectations. We won’t hesitate to work with Tharwah again in future projects.

At the National Events Center, we worked with Tharwah on an Organizational development project, and during our engagement, we had an amazing experience. Tharwah uses best-fit global practices and methodologies in carrying out the consultancy work. What we liked the most is their flexibility, accessibility and diversity of tools, attention to details and passion to deliver high quality. We hope to continue working with them on other projects in the future.
What is Tharwah Academy?
Tharwah Academy is the training and development arm of Tharwah, offering specialized learning experiences designed to empower individuals and organizations.
What services does Tharwah Academy offer?

We offer a variety of training tracks and HR certifications, in addition to a comprehensive range of customized learning solutions for organizations, covering areas such as coaching, training consulting services, and professional skills development.
Who delivers the training courses at Tharwah Academy?
Training is delivered by experienced professionals and certified experts with deep knowledge in their respective fields.
Do you work with individuals or only organizations?
We support both individuals looking to grow professionally and organizations seeking to develop their workforce capabilities.
Can training courses be customized based on the organization’s needs?
Yes, we offer customized training courses tailored to your company’s nature and employee levels to ensure maximum benefit.
Do you offer in-person or virtual training?
We offer flexible training formats, including in-person, virtual, and blended learning to suit different needs and preferences.
Does the Academy provide accredited certificates upon completion of training courses?
Yes, we collaborate with internationally recognized training institutions to ensure that participants receive globally accredited certificates.
Where are your offices located?
Our head office is in Riyadh, in the Al-Narjis district, and we proudly serve our clients from additional locations in Jeddah, Dammam, Dubai, and Egypt.
We aim to unleash the potential of individuals and organizations to achieve outstanding performance and attain remarkable outcomes.
